about.title: My Journey
about.subtitle: Aspiring Network Engineer and FullStack Developer, hands-on with network automation, Linux, real-world programming, and problem-solving.
about.story1: I am dedicated to becoming a top-tier Network Administrator and Developer. Experienced in networking, server admin, web development, and automation. Proficient in Python, Java, PHP, OOP, and Git/GitHub, with strong communication and leadership skills.
about.story2: My journey spans network simulation labs, full-stack web apps, and advanced automation using modern tools (Linux, GNS3, EVE-NG, Flask, etc.). I thrive on fast learning and tackling complex technical problems.
about.story3: I believe that robust automation, teamwork, and clean code can transform tech organizations. Every project and job is an opportunity to grow, apply new knowledge, and build real-world impact.

experience.title: Professional Journey

experience.jobs.description: Gained strong technical, communication, and problem-solving skills through club tech projects. Proficient in Python, Java, PHP, OOP, Git, and GitHub.
achievements: Supported peer learning, problem-solving, and project delivery.
Improved coding in Python, Java, PHP; expertise in OOP, Git, GitHub.
Led and contributed to multi-stack developer projects.

experience.jobs.description: Built advanced virtual labs using Cisco Packet Tracer and GNS3. Completed CCNA through hands-on labs. Developed automated network workflows with Python.
achievements: Simulated enterprise networks in Packet Tracer/GNS3.
Completed all CCNA labs and certification modules.
Implemented network automation tasks using Python/scripts.

experience.jobs.role: Intern, Network & Systems (Stagiaire Réseaux Informatiques et Admin Systèmes)
experience.jobs.description: Lead developer on AutoNetConfig: a hybrid system for real-time monitoring/automation in enterprise networks (EVE-NG, Python, Linux, Flask, Nmap). Collaborated with technicians and engineers to deploy and visualize automated network solutions.
achievements: Designed scalable network automation with EVE-NG, Flask, Nmap, Linux.
Wrote Python scripts for scanning, inventory, and config management.

education.title: Academic Background

education.schools.institution: ISCAE Mauritania (Institut Supérieur de Comptabilité et d’Administration des Entreprises)
education.schools.description: Academic training in networks, IT, and digital infrastructure. Strong focus on systems integration, automation, secure network setups, and rapid adaptability in tech environments.
Specialization in mathematics and physical sciences, graduated with top GPA. Built strong foundations in logic, analysis, and scientific problem-solving for modern tech, programming, and networks.
